container-title: He lives in Nottingham, UK. When the swarms of Hive Fleet Hydra descend upon the world of Vondrak, the Knights of Cadmus answer the call to war. A BLACK LIBRARY PUBLICATION Published in 2016 by Black Library, Games Workshop Ltd
note: Willow Road, Nottingham, NG7 2WS, UK. Produced by Games Workshop in Nottingham.
title: Andy Clark has written the Warhammer 40,000 short story ‘Whiteout’, the Age of Sigmar short story ‘Gorechosen’, and the Warhammer Quest Silver Tower novella Labyrinth of the Lost. Andy works as a background writer for Games Workshop, crafting the worlds of Warhammer Age of Sigmar and Warhammer 40,000

note: A CIP record for this book is available from the British Library.
